WuWa-Mod-AntiAntiCheat.pak: Will disable logging events from anti-cheat
WuWa-Mod-AutoPickTreasure.pak:
Will automatically open chests and loot items
Chests have to be rendered by the game to loot it and do not support puzzle chests.
WuWa-Mod-KillAuraInfinite.pak: Will kill automatically any monster nearby
WuWa-Mod-PerceptionRange(wip).pak: Will be able to interact with objects/entities from a higher range than normal
